com.aevi.helpers

Class BundleHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aevi.helpers.BundleHelper

  • public final class BundleHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for TransactionResult and the various request classes (i.e. PaymentRequest). This class contains a lot of helper methods to serialize data for instance of type BigDecimal,Enum and a few other types and contains convenience getters with default values in case of missing data.

    • Method Detail

      • put

        public static void put(android.os.Bundle bundle,
       java.lang.Enum<?> key,
       java.lang.Enum<?> value)
        Puts an Enum element in the bundle.
        Parameters:
        bundle - bundle to insert the value into. This parameter must not be null.
        key - an enum value that acts as the key. This parameter must not be null.
        value - enumeration value to insert.

      • get

        public static <T extends java.lang.Enum<T>> T get(android.os.Bundle bundle,
                                  java.lang.Enum<?> key,
                                  java.lang.Class<T> enumType,
                                  T defaultValue)
        Gets an Enum from the bundle. If the key is not found, or if the key is found but its underlying value does not map onto a valid entry in the target enumeration, the default value is returned;

        In order to correctly de-serialize the enum, the enum class is needed. For example: 

         
 ValueEnum value = foo.get(KeyEnum.key, ValueEnum.class, ValueEnum.defaultValue);
        Parameters:
        bundle - bundle to retrieve the value from. This parameter must not be null.
        key - an enum value that acts as the key. This parameter must not be null.
        enumType - enumeration class. This parameter must not be null.
        defaultValue - value to return if the key is not found.
        Returns:
        the enum value indicated by key, or default value if the key does not exist in the bundle or when the string value in the bundle does not correspond to a valid element in the target enum.

      • putAmount

        public static void putAmount(android.os.Bundle bundle,
             java.lang.Enum<?> key,
             java.math.BigDecimal value)
        Puts a BigDecimal value in the bundle.
        Parameters:
        bundle - bundle to insert the value into. This parameter must not be null.
        key - an enum value that acts as the key. This parameter must not be null.
        value - value (amount) to put in the bundle. Fractional cents are not allowed. This parameter must not be null.
        Throws:
        InvalidAmountException - when an amount is given that has fractional cents.

      • getAmount

        public static java.math.BigDecimal getAmount(android.os.Bundle bundle,
                             java.lang.Enum<?> key,
                             java.math.BigDecimal defaultValue)
        Retrieves a BigDecimal number from the bundle. If the key does not exist in the bundle, the default value is returned.
        Parameters:
        bundle - bundle to retrieve the value from. This parameter must not be null.
        key - an enum value that acts as the key. This parameter must not be null.
        defaultValue - value to return if the key does not exist.
        Returns:
        the desired BigDecimal amount, or the default value if the key was not found in the bundle.

      • getAmount

        public static java.math.BigDecimal getAmount(android.os.Bundle bundle,
                             java.lang.Enum<?> key)
        Retrieves a BigDecimal number from the bundle. If the key does not exist in the bundle, 0.00 is returned.
        Parameters:
        bundle - bundle to insert the value into. This parameter must not be null.
        key - an enum value that acts as the key. This parameter must not be null.
        Returns:
        the desired BigDecimal amount, or 0.00 if the key was not found in the bundle.

        key - an enum value that acts as the key. This parameter must not be null.
        value - boolean value to associate with the key.

        public static java.lang.Integer getInteger(android.os.Bundle bundle,
                           java.lang.Enum<?> key,
                           java.lang.Integer defaultValue)
        Gets a integer value form the bundle. If the key is not found in the bundle the empty string is returned.
        Parameters:
        bundle - bundle to retrieve the value from. This parameter must not be null.
        key - an enum value that acts as the key. This parameter must not be null.
        defaultValue - value to return if the key is not found in the bundle.
        Returns:
        requested value, or default value if not found.

      • getStringArray

        public static java.lang.String[] getStringArray(android.os.Bundle bundle,
                                java.lang.Enum<?> key)
        Gets a string array from the bundle. If the key is not found in the bundle, an empty array is returned.
        Parameters:
        bundle - bundle to retrieve the value from. This parameter must not be null.
        key - an enum value that acts as the key. This parameter must not be null.
        Returns:
        array of string values, or the empty array if the key is not found.

      • contains

        public static boolean contains(android.os.Bundle bundle,
               java.lang.Enum<?> key)
        Checks if a given key exists in the bundle.
        Parameters:
        bundle - bundle to check. This parameter must not be null.
        key - an enum value that acts as the key. This parameter must not be null.
        Returns:
        true if the key exists in the bundle.

      • bundleFromIntent

        public static android.os.Bundle bundleFromIntent(android.content.Intent intent,
                                 java.lang.String identifier)
                                          throws AeviRequestDataMissingException
        Obtains a bundle from an Intent. The bundle should be added to the Intent as an extra, using the given identifier. If the bundle is not found in the intent, a AeviRequestDataMissingException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        intent - Intent object that carries the bundle as an extra. This parameter must not be null.
        identifier - key the bundle is stored under. This parameter must not be null.
        Returns:
        the requested bundle.
        Throws:
        AeviRequestDataMissingException - if the Intent is not correctly setup
